content: free to view on my blog at reginapdesigns com **these adorable little ornaments are perfect for any tree or present this pattern includes directions for creating both ornaments perfect little scrap buster items just in time for the holidays ** **if you have any questions about this pattern or any of the other patterns from regina p designs or want to show off your finished projects with our patterns please join our facebook group https //www facebook com/groups/869715883461437/** **check out regina p designs website to find out more get sneak peaks free patterns & sales https //www reginapdesigns com/** ***materials *** caron one pound yarn approx 25 yds each i 5 25mm hook scissors needle jute twine small bell heart small button star ***abbreviations us terms *** skip = skip sts = stitches st = stitch sl= slip_stitch chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet tc = treble_crochet copyright 2023 regina p designs all rights reserved all content copyright and other rights reserved by regina p designs no content may be duplicated without express written consent by purchasing/downloading/using any regina p designs patterns you agree to the terms of use -all regina p designs patterns are for personal use only -it is prohibited to reproduce copy publish in any form including video or distribute this pattern its parts or photos in any way or form including translations into foreign languages -you are free to do as you wish with the finished products made from these patterns with the agreement that regina p designs will be credited for the pattern itself return/refund policy due to the fact that it is impossible to return a digital file all sales are final if you have a problem with working out parts of a pattern please contact the designer for help
